verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-LOC: in a tweet] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: that he will deliver his decision on the Iran nuclear deal on Tuesday at 2 p.m. ET] .
President Donald Trump announced in a tweet on Monday that he [V: will] deliver his decision on the Iran nuclear deal on Tuesday at 2 p.m. ET .
